reviewText: [ I've already played the adult version of this game, so I'll basically copy and paste my review again with a few more thoughts about this teen" version ]\n\nThis game is… different. Very different from happy VNs. If you feel triggered about depression and suicide
date: DO NOT PLAY THIS GAME. Overall
recommended: I think this VN was made for a more mature audience (even if this is the teen version; yes
hoursPlayed: there's no explicit porn or very direct dialogue about sex
voteText: but still... I feel that this game still carries a "heavy meaning"
